input.sentences: [female] was from a wealthy family that liked to travel .
[male] was from a wealthy family as well .
[female] and [male] were married shortly after meeting .
they had 2 daughters | the oldest being [female] .
output.sentences: This giant sailing vessel carried wealthy people that wanted to travel the worlld in style, like this female.
This stylishly dressed, wealthy man, undoubtedly was traveling with his family.
Sometimes travelers were on the voyage to arrange a meeting with an intended spouse they were shortly due to be married to.
Females were supposed to marry and it was a father's duty to arrange for his daughters future,  even if there were 2, or more, and one had to procure mates overseas.
If one had two daughters, one had to launch them into society and find them suitable mates.
